item.title: The Prospect of Being Wrong and the Insecurities That Follow
item.description:
The Prospect of Being Wrong and the Insecurities That Follow

This is part 5 in an ongoing series. Continued from "From Pride To Exclusivity To Swift Condemnation" All things considered, I doubt pride is the predominant cause of our refusal to question or διαλέγομαι (reason and discuss) traditions. It seems the more likely culprit is insecurity.

item.title: Suppressing Our Inner Theologians For Clarity
item.description:
Suppressing Our Inner Theologians For Clarity

It is easy to get lost in the depths of theology, soteriology, eschatology, and perhaps a few other ologies. Sometimes we miss the beautiful simplicity of the message. The Bible is not exclusive to theologians. God did not inspire it to help us bulk up our official creeds.
